raw akas.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch

akas: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (original title)
Sabrina: Segredos de uma Bruxa Portugal
Sabrina, Secretos de Brujas Spain (alternative title)
akas from release info: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (original title)
Sabrina: Segredos de uma Bruxa Portugal
Sabrina, Secretos de Brujas Spain (alternative title)

1.title: Dances with Werewolves

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

1.plot: When magic makes its way from Witch World into the human world, Sabrina must protect her best friend, Harvey, who is forever changed by it as he is turned into a savagely violent werewolf every full moon.

2.title: Scream It with Flowers

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

2.plot: Enchantra puts a dark curse on the red roses Sabrina brings to school to give to her human friends on Valentine's Day. With Veralupa's help, Sabrina must gather all of the snarling fanged roses to keep her human friends safe from being eaten alive.

3.title: Ice Giant for Tea

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

3.plot: When Sabrina has both a school play and a witch battle with her and her cousin Ambrose against an Ice Giant on the same night, her friendship with Jessie - the only human that knows that she is a witch - is put to the test; especially with Enchantra's arrogant son, Shinji, running interference during the battle.

4.title: Shock Rock

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

4.plot: Sabrina is in charge of finding a band for a benefit concert in Greendale, but Shinji's plans to put together his own band in Witch World makes Sabrina's job much more difficult.

5.title: No Time

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

5.plot: Time freezes in the human world when Sabrina accidentally loses the Hourglass of Horus that regulates time between both the human and witch worlds.

6.title: Faking Up Is Hard to Do

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

6.plot: Sabrina is forced to cancel her plans with Jim when Enchantra insists that she and Shinji have a romantic dinner together in Witch World.

7.title: Hic! Hic! Boom!

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

7.plot: When Shinji kidnaps a baby dragon during a class assignment, it gets loose in the human world with a bad case of fiery hiccups in the form of fireballs. Sabrina must find and return it to its mother, who is angrily attacking Enchantra and the other wizards and witches until her baby is safety returned.

8.title: Best Friends Fighting

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

8.plot: Enchantra turns Sabrina and Jessie from best friends to sworn enemies by hiding fighting sprites in their true friendship bracelets. Sabrina, being half-witch, manages to break free and now she must save Jessie before she hurts herself and their intense friendship.

9.title: Return of the Werewolf

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

9.plot: During a full moon, Harvey turns into a werewolf and runs amok. So Sabrina and Veralupa try to get him back home safely.

10.title: Creatures and Caves

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

10.plot: The kids engage in a role-playing game in the woods. But the game soon becomes a reality after they unknowingly enter the magical world via a secret mystical portal hidden in a tree.

11.title: See No Sabrina, Hear No Sabrina

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

11.plot: Salem feels Sabrina is ignoring him and tries to turn Jim invisible but accidentantly casts it on Sabrina and must figure out how to reverse it.

12.title: Hurry Scurry

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

12.plot: When Sabrina's spell goes awry, she turns her professor into a chicken and aunts into mice and must reverse the spell before Salem's hunger game.

13.title: Ultra-Stitious

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

13.plot: In order to recharge and further strengthen their magic wands, Sabrina and her friends are at the healing stone. However, an extremely powerful energy vortex created from increasingly believed human superstitions threatens to destroy all of Witch World.

14.title: Sabrina the Troll Princess

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

14.plot: Sabrina gets amnesia and is abducted by trolls, who is tricked into thinking she's a princess of trolls. Before long, the trolls use her powers to ambush witch school.

15.title: Baby-Witching

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

15.plot: Sabrina has an adventure with babysitting after she volunteers to watch Jessie's cousin Max.

16.title: Night Pests

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

16.plot: Sabrina has a recurring nightmare. She then finds out that her human and witch friends are having the same dreams.

17.title: A Renewed Sense of Magic

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

17.plot: Sabrina's aunts forget to renew their witch license and revert to teenagers until it is renewed.

18.title: Super-Brina

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

18.plot: After Harvey sees Sabrina use magic he believes she is a super hero.

19.title: Home Sweet Home

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

19.plot: A real estate developer wants to demolish Sabrina's aunts' shop to create a parking lot for a new mall. Meanwhile Sabrina tries to stop the project with a scheme that gets out of hand.

20.title: Now You See It...

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

20.plot: Harvey tries out for the school's talent show as a magician. Trouble starts when he finds Sabrina's wand.

21.title: Magic No More

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

21.plot: Sabrina gets sick and and loses her powers. Meanwhile, the illness spreads to other witches and each loses their powers as well. Sabrina and Shinji go to the human world to find the source of the illness.

22.title: What a Ride

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

22.plot: Sabrina's aunts employ her to make deliveries for them, but problems arise when Shinji gets trapped inside of Sabrina's scooter.

23.title: Who Let the Cat Out?

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

23.plot: Salem runs away from Electra. After falling into a cauldron he returns to his warlock self.

24.title: Chariots of Fear

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

24.plot: Sabrina gets trapped in Witch World to complete a test of the Journey of 10,000 steps. In the human world Sabrina's Aunt Hilda steps in to present her biology project.

25.title: Careful What You Witch For

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

25.plot: After being freed by Sabrina, an overeager genie known as Djinn grants all of her wishes, along with the wishes of everyone in town.

26.title: Spella!

episode of.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch (TV Series 2013–2014)

26.plot: Sabrina and Enchantra are banished to the human world by Enchantra's sister. Then they battle her for leadership.

imdb.plot outline: Sabrina is half-witch and half-human, and all super hero as she leads two vastly different lives; one disguised as a normal, klutzy high school student and the other as the top sorcery student in the magical world. When her two worlds collide, Sabrina is the only one who has the power to battle her foes, while managing to keep her magical identity a secret from humankind.
imdb.title: Sabrina: Secrets of a Teenage Witch
plot: Sabrina is half-witch and half-human, and all super hero as she leads two vastly different lives; one disguised as a normal, klutzy high school student and the other as the top sorcery student in the magical world. When her two worlds collide, Sabrina is the only one who has the power to battle her foes, while managing to keep her magical identity a secret from humankind.::Archie Comics
